item.title: Periodic and Average Periodic Returns of Financial Portfolios using R
item.description: Introduction Institutional and Hedge Fund managers return from summer vacation and adjust their financial portfolios at the end of each summer, causing a selloff pressure in the market. September is considered a bad month for the Bulls [1] “Given that September tends to be a bad month for the market, I’m urging you to be prepared …” Jim Cramer on CNBC, September 11, 2020. For this and other reasons, such as election hypes, pandemic, etc.
